fields.name: Door to Door (Passive):
fields.value: Each HN you make, you will be told if that player can win with your last HN target. This will not count as a visit.

fields.name: Pamphlet (1x, 90%):
fields.value:
Give anyone you’ve never had an HN with a pamphlet. They will receive a message that indicates the nature (attack, investigation, RB, etc.,) of the most recent visit to a random player you *have* HN’d with (or multiple if they were visited more than once at a time).

A Moment to Talk (0x, 125%) Use during the evening to open an HN-style night chat with another player.

fields.name: Part of a Plan (1x):
fields.value: Be told the most recent visit made by all dead players who you have ever out-placed in the evening rounds.
